newsitem.title: UK: BOE allots 1.362 bln stg in outright bills, repo.
newsitem.headline: BOE allots 1.362 bln stg in outright bills, repo.

text.p: The Bank of England said that it provided the UK money market with 1.362 billion stg of further assistance.
It allotted 1.161 bln stg in bills outright and 201 million stg in repos to June 9.
This takes total liquidity provided today to 2.525 billion stg comapred with its estimate of a 2.5 billion shortage.
The bank also said no use had been made so far of the discount houses' late repo facility.
